scheduler.name: scheduler
scheduler.label: UniPC Multistep Scheduler
scheduler.description: The UniPC Multistep Scheduler is used for WAN 2.1 14B I2V.

inputs.prompt: The ultra-realistic seven-headed fire-breathing dragon slowly comes to life. Each head moves independently with distinct personality and weight—one head coils forward and roars, flames building in its throat; another tilts sideways, eyes narrowing with intelligence; a third snaps aggressively, jaws opening to release sparks and embers. Long neck muscles flex realistically beneath obsidian scales, skin stretching and contracting with lifelike tension. Smoke escapes nostrils in rhythmic breaths. Subtle heat distortion ripples the air around the heads. The main body remains massive and grounded while the heads sway, coil, strike, and observe. Cinematic camera push-in, shallow depth of field, ultra-realistic physics, natural motion blur, dramatic firelight illumination, dark fantasy atmosphere, epic scale, slow and powerful movement, 4K cinematic realism.
inputs.negative_prompt: lowres, text, error, cropped, worst quality, low quality, jpeg artifacts, ugly, duplicate, morbid, mutilated, out of frame, extra fingers, mutated hands, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn face, mutation, deformed, blurry, dehydrated, bad anatomy, bad proportions, extra limbs, cloned face, disfigured, gross proportions, malformed limbs, missing arms, missing legs, extra arms, extra legs, fused fingers, too many fingers, long neck, username, watermark, signature
